data.title: Toxic Avenger [Archive]
data.text:
verminator_x

Any Tromaville fans out there or Troma fans?

Ive just purchesed Toxic Avenger 1,2 and 3 i know they made a fourth movie but it sucked.

I dont want to call the movie classic but more like cult movies from the 80s, and i still laughs when i see these movies couse if you loved "Braindead" or "Meet the Feebles" From the not so unfamous Director of Lord Of The Rings Movies Peter Jackson you will love toxie movies more its so sick and yet funny you cant walk away from the television screen.

verminator_x

the cartoon was running on television in the early 90s i think the tv show was called "The Toxic Crusaders" and they had to make it more friendly than the movies becouse it was meant to the kids.

in the first comics of toxic avenger/crusader you can see melvins transformation from geeky nerd to hidious monster.i just saw Toxic Avenger The Movie and the Toxies girlfriend i think her name was sarah, is it just me or does this girl look alot like another famous Sarah Michelle Gellar.

The girl who plays Toxies girl is Andreee Maranda or miranda but i couldent find her in any other movies in imbd search.

I know she got the role couse she was dating some guy tha did the film screen. ok you did not need alot of good acting to play a part of this movie, wich is truly fun, another fun fact is that Marisa Tomei is playing a very very small part in this movie. i still havent recognize her in the film.

she is one of the girls at the healt club gym but wich one i dont know.

and her name is not creditet in the end of the movie.
